Class VikingBotListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • bwapi.DefaultBWListener
      • listener.GameListener
        • VikingBotListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    bwapi.BWEventListener
    public class VikingBotListener
extends GameListener
    The main GameListener used for initializing the agents and updating them every frame.
